OOC Everybody sing Istanbuls not Constantinople now it's Istanbul not
Constantinople. (They Might Be Giants)

Anyways Gold Star for Yan.

BIC

Ignatius' scanners were probably better than Slayers from the air. He'd
already pinpointed the location when he caught something heading thier way.
"Scan north East, somethings heading this way fast ." the object was still
to far away to identify but for some odd reason it seemed to be useing a
Trainer carrier wave for communication.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 12, 2001 8:47 PM
Subject: Re: OOC: / Slayer


> Istanbul.
>
> ::Slayer::
>
> "Allright." Slayer says, changing course to head to the specified
location. He activates his scanners as he nears it, trying to find the exact
location.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > Ignatius scans the land and seems surprised to have such detailed
scanners.
> > "North by Northeast." he scans further for the Trainer markings, "Its
> > located on the land bridge west of  a small body of water, and South of
what
> > the humans will call the Black Sea." (Can anyone tell me what major city
is
> > nearby?)
>
